bzh.terrevirtuelle.navisuleapmotion.server

Class Server.HandlerServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • bzh.terrevirtuelle.navisuleapmotion.server.Server.HandlerServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Server

    private class Server.HandlerServer
extends java.lang.Thread
    A private thread to handle capitalization requests on a particular socket. The client terminates the dialogue by sending a single line containing only a period.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void run()
